meanings.definition: The state of not engaging or participating in something.
meanings.sent1: Her nonengagement in the discussion was noticeable.
meanings.sent2: His nonengagement in the project led to misunderstandings.
meanings.sent3: The nonengagement of the cat in the game of fetch was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The nonengagement of the audience left the performer feeling lonely.
meanings.sent5: The nonengagement of the student in class was like a silent protest.

meanings.definition: The act of refraining from becoming involved or committed.
meanings.sent1: The nonengagement of the company in the deal surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: Her nonengagement in the argument helped maintain peace.
meanings.sent3: The nonengagement of the squirrel in the nut-gathering competition was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: His nonengagement in the debate was like a shield against criticism.
meanings.sent5: The nonengagement of the team captain cost them the game.
